name: E-con News Terminal - Retro Brutalism News Portal
description: AI-powered financial news portal with retro brutalism design and terminal interface

data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><rect width='100' height='100' fill='%23000000'/><defs><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='2' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter><pattern id='dots' width='3' height='3' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><circle cx='1.5' cy='1.5' r='0.3' fill='%2300ff00' opacity='0.1'/></pattern></defs><rect width='100' height='100' fill='url(%23dots)'/><rect x='2' y='2' width='96' height='96' fill='none' stroke='%2300ff00' stroke-width='0.5' filter='url(%23glow)'/><text x='50' y='15' font-size='3' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace' filter='url(%23glow)'>E-CON.NEWS.TERMINAL.v2024</text><text x='50' y='55' font-size='40' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' filter='url(%23glow)'>🖥️</text><text x='50' y='90' font-size='3' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace' filter='url(%23glow)'>AI.FINANCIAL.ANALYSIS</text></svg>

screenshots.src: data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1280 720'><rect width='1280' height='720' fill='%23000000'/><defs><pattern id='grid-bg' width='40' height='40' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><path d='M 40 0 L 0 0 0 40' fill='none' stroke='%2300ff00' stroke-width='0.5' opacity='0.1'/></pattern></defs><rect width='1280' height='720' fill='url(%23grid-bg)'/><rect x='20' y='20' width='1240' height='680' fill='none' stroke='%2300ff00' stroke-width='2'/><text x='640' y='60' font-size='24' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>E-CON NEWS TERMINAL - DESKTOP INTERFACE</text><rect x='60' y='100' width='1160' height='560' fill='%23000000' stroke='%2300ff00' stroke-width='1'/><text x='640' y='140' font-size='16' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>╔══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗</text><text x='640' y='160' font-size='16' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>║  E-CON NEWS TERMINAL v2.024 - RETRO BRUTALISM INTERFACE    ║</text><text x='640' y='180' font-size='16' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>╚══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝</text><text x='640' y='220' font-size='20' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>🖥️ AI-POWERED FINANCIAL NEWS PORTAL 🖥️</text><text x='100' y='280' font-size='12' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>root@econews:~# news --category=all</text><text x='100' y='300' font-size='12' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>> Loading financial data streams...</text><text x='100' y='320' font-size='12' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>> [OK] 1,337 articles processed</text><text x='100' y='360' font-size='14' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>📊 FEATURES:</text><text x='100' y='380' font-size='12' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>├─ Real-time news aggregation</text><text x='100' y='400' font-size='12' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>├─ AI-powered content analysis</text><text x='100' y='420' font-size='12' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>├─ Terminal command interface</text><text x='100' y='440' font-size='12' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>├─ Multi-perspective debate system</text><text x='100' y='460' font-size='12' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>└─ Retro brutalism design</text><text x='640' y='620' font-size='10' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace' opacity='0.7'>Vietnamese financial news + International markets + AI analysis</text></svg>
screenshots.label: E-con News Terminal Desktop Interface

font-size='8' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>║  MOBILE TERMINAL INTERFACE      ║</text><text x='195' y='140' font-size='8' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>╚═══════════════════════════════════╝</text><text x='30' y='170' font-size='6' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>root@mobile:~# status</text><text x='30' y='185' font-size='6' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>> System: ONLINE</text><text x='30' y='200' font-size='6' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>> Users: 1,337,420</text><text x='30' y='215' font-size='6' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>> AI Queries: 42,069</text><text x='30' y='240' font-size='7' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>📱 MOBILE FEATURES:</text><text x='30' y='255' font-size='6' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>• Touch-friendly interface</text><text x='30' y='270' font-size='6' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>• Responsive brutalism design</text><text x='30' y='285' font-size='6' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>• Full AI chat integration</text><text x='30' y='300' font-size='6' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>• PWA installation</text><text x='30' y='315' font-size='6' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>• Offline capability</text><rect x='20' y='400' width='350' height='200' fill='%23000000' stroke='%2300ff00' stroke-width='1'/><text x='195' y='430' font-size='8' text-anchor='middle' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>NEWS ARTICLES</text><rect x='30' y='450' width='330' height='40' fill='none' stroke='%2300ff00' stroke-width='0.5'/><text x='35' y='465' font-size='5' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>[CRITICAL] MARKET UPDATE</text><text x='35' y='475' font-size='4' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>Financial markets experiencing volatility...</text><rect x='30' y='500' width='330' height='40' fill='none' stroke='%2300ff00' stroke-width='0.5'/><text x='35' y='515' font-size='5' text-anchor='start' fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace'>[URGENT] AI BREAKTHROUGH</text><text fill='%2300ff00' font-family='monospace' opacity='0.7'>Terminal interface for mobile devices</text></svg>
